rand::dist::uniform

Function rand::dist::uniform::codepoint [−] [src]

pub fn codepoint<R: Rng + ?Sized>(rng: &mut R) -> char

Sample a char, uniformly distributed over all Unicode scalar values, i.e. all code points in the range 0...0x10_FFFF, except for the range 0xD800...0xDFFF (the surrogate code points). This includes unassigned/reserved code points.
